extracted_playbook.title: Identify Installed Plugin Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check the installed version of the Essential Addons for Elementor plugin to determine if it is within the affected range (5.4.0 to 5.7.1).

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the installed plugin version affected (5.4.0 to 5.7.1)?

extracted_playbook.title: Update Plugin to Version 5.7.2
extracted_playbook.description: Update the Essential Addons for Elementor plugin to version 5.7.2 to mitigate the vulnerability.

cve_id: Essential Addons for Elementor Plugin Vulnerability
affected_products: Essential Addons for Elementor Plugin versions 5.4.0 to 5.7.1
